short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MrBird game offline, flappy bird remake

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome webstore version of the popular game, MrBird!

A fun game that plays in a popup

This chrome extension allows you to play your favorite arcade game, anytime, anywhere! Just click on the MrBird in the top right corner of your browser, and start playing! If you loved MrBird, you'll love this game.
